string.value: When you reach Lv. 120, #p1013000# has once again grown bigger. Could he have some leftover scales like last time? Talk to #p1013000#.

#p1013000# gives you another scale that contains the power of the Dragon. It seems to contain stronger power than the last time. You should be able to make another good item using the #bMake Skill#k.\n\nIn any case, #p1013000# now looks pretty imposing... If you didn't become strong along with #p1013000#, you might be too afraid to even look him in the eye.
